name: Battering Ram
uniques: Will not be displayed in Civilopedia

civilopediaText.text: A battering Ram, what else would you expect. Not as crudely crafted as the hunnic one, so this one requires a lot more production effort to produce.

name: UU 12
uniques: May enter foreign tiles without open borders
Will not be displayed in Civilopedia
Can be purchased with [Faith] [in all cities]
Can be purchased with [Gold] [in all cities]
Takes your religion over the one in their birth city
This Unit gains the [Corrupting I] promotion <upon ending a turn in a [City-states] tile> <in tiles adjacent to [City center]> <with [15]% chance>
This Unit gains the [Corrupting II] promotion <upon ending a turn in a [City-states] tile> <in tiles adjacent to [City center]> <for units with [Corrupting I]> <with [20]% chance>
This Unit gains the [Corrupting III] promotion <upon ending a turn in a [City-states] tile> <in tiles adjacent to [City center]> <for units with [Corrupting II]> <with [25]% chance>
This Unit loses the [Attack Block] promotion <upon ending a turn in a [City-states] tile> <in tiles adjacent to [City center]> <for units with [Corrupting III]> <with [50]% chance>
This Unit gains the [Attack Block] promotion <upon ending a turn in a [your] tile>
Instantly provides [1] [Corrupting Counter] <upon conquering a city>
